header.title: Client Reviews
header.subtitle: Do not just take our word for it. Here is what our community has to say.

reviews.name: Mick Stone
reviews.content: I have always trusted John with my pride and joy. His service is unrivalled. The attention to detail is something you just do not find at the big dealerships anymore.

reviews.name: Mary B.
reviews.content: Thanks for getting me back on the road John, I would be lost without you. The collection service from Intel was a lifesaver.

reviews.name: Tom Williams
reviews.content: We had an unlucky collision in the bad icy conditions over Christmas. JM Motors had us right in 3 days, and the bill was not half as bad as I thought it would be. Top class.

reviews.name: Darren Mooney
reviews.content: We left our van in with JM Motors to be repaired and they dealt with the insurance company directly, it really cut down the hassle involved. Highly recommended for commercial work.

reviews.name: Sarah C.
reviews.content: Passed my NCT first time after a pre-check here. They spotted a suspension issue that would have failed me. Honest and reliable.

cta.text: Have you used our services? We would love to hear from you.
